dict.acceptation: 筛（煤、矿石等）；拍摄；放映（电影）；庇护；

sent.orig: In this sense'screen" is usually taken to be of American origin.
sent.trans: 作此义解的“screen”常被认为源自美国。

sent.orig: Screen will keep appending data to the file through multiple sessions.
sent.trans: screen会把多个会话的数据添加到文件中。

sent.orig: All screen windows are still there and you can re-attach to them later.
sent.trans: 所有的screen窗口都待在那里，你可以稍后重新接管它们。

sent.orig: Screen a several great features for helping you administer your server more productively and safely.
sent.trans: screen包含多个特性来帮助你更高效、更安全地管理你的服务器。

sent.orig: There are five kinds of forth screen, back screen, side screen, stationary screen and moving screen.
sent.trans: 有五种，分别是前掩护、后掩护、侧掩护、定位掩护以及行进间掩护。
